item.title: Meli add a quote by Rodney Dangerfield
item.description: "I came from a real tough neighborhood. Once a guy pulled a knife on me. I knew he wasn't a professional, the knife had butter on it." -- Rodney Dangerfield

item.title: Meli add a quote by Rodney Dangerfield
item.description: "I told my psychiatrist that everyone hates me. He said I was being ridiculous - everyone hasn't met me yet." -- Rodney Dangerfield

item.title: Meli add a quote by Rodney Dangerfield
item.description: "I say 'no' to drugs. Whenever someone asks me for some of my drugs I say, 'no." -- Rodney Dangerfield

item.title: Meli add a quote by Jerry Seinfeld
item.description: "A bookstore is one of the only pieces of evidence we have that people are still thinking." -- Jerry Seinfeld

item.title: Meli add a quote by Jerry Seinfeld
item.description: "What I don't understand is how women can pour hot wax on their bodies, let it dry, then rip out every single hair by its root and still be scared of spiders." -- Jerry Seinfeld

item.title: Meli add a quote by Jerry Seinfeld
item.description: "The Swiss have an interesting army. Five hundred years without a war. Pretty impressive. Also pretty lucky for them. Ever seen that little Swiss Army knife they have to fight with? Not much of a weapon there. Corkscrews. Bottle openers. ‘Come on, buddy, let’s go. You get past me, the guy in the back of me, he’s got a spoon. Back off, I’ve got the toe clippers right here." -- Jerry Seinfeld

item.title: Meli add a quote by Jerry Seinfeld
item.description: "Life is truly a ride. We're all strapped in and no one can stop it. When the doctor slaps your behind, he's ripping your ticket and away you go. As you make each passage from youth to adulthood to maturity, sometimes you put your arms up and scream, sometimes you just hang on to that bar in front of you. But the ride is the thing. I think the most you can hope for at the end of life is that your hair's messed, you're out of breath, and you didn't throw up." -- Jerry Seinfeld

item.title: Meli add a quote by Jerry Seinfeld
item.description: "It s amazing that the amount of news that happens in the world every day always just exactly fits the newspaper." -- Jerry Seinfeld

item.title: Meli add a quote by Jerry Seinfeld
item.description: "What is this obsession people have with books? They put them in their houses like they're trophies. What do you need it for after you read it?" -- Jerry Seinfeld

item.title: Meli add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Meli add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you want your children to be intelligent, read them fairy tales. If you want them to be more intelligent, read them more fairy tales." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Meli add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Meli add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "When you are courting a nice girl an hour seems like a second. When you sit on a red-hot cinder a second seems like an hour. That's relativity." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Meli add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Meli add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "A clever person solves a problem. A wise person avoids it." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Meli add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Meli add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Meli add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "Bermimpilah, karena Tuhan akan memeluk mimpi-mimpi itu." -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: Meli add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "Jika kita berupaya sekuat tenaga menemukan sesuatu, dan pada titik akhir upaya itu hasilnya masih nihil, maka sebenarnya kita telah menemukan yang kita cari dalam diri kita sendiri, yakni kenyataan, kenyataan yang harus dihadapi sepahit apapun keadaanya." -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: Meli add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "Hiduplah Untuk Memberi yang Sebanyak-banyaknya, Bukan untuk Menerima yang Sebanyak-banyaknya. (Pak Harfan)" -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: Meli add a quote by andrea hirata
item.description: "u r what u read u r what u write" -- andrea hirata

item.title: Meli add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "Pesimistik tidak lebih daripada sikap takbur mendahului nasib." -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: Meli add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "...ilmu demikian luas untuk disombongkan..." -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: Meli add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "Tuhan tahu tapi menunggu" -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: Meli add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "Tak ada yang dapat dicapai di dunia ini tanpa usaha yang rasional." -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: Meli add a quote by Dee
item.description: "Kita tidak bisa menyamakan kopi dengan air tebu. Sesempurna apa pun kopi yang kamu buat, kopi tetap kopi, punya sisi pahit yang tak mungkin kamu sembunyikan." -- Dee

item.title: Meli add a quote by Dee
item.description: "Kita memang tak pernah tahu apa yang dirindukan sampai sesuatu itu tiba di depan mata." -- Dee

item.title: Meli add a quote by Dee
item.description: "Hati tidak memilih. Hati dipilih. Karena hati tidak perlu memilih, ia selalu tahu kemana harus berlabuh" -- Dee

item.title: Meli add a quote by Eddie Vedder
item.description: "The sorrow grows bigger when the sorrow's denied" -- Eddie Vedder

item.title: Meli add a quote by Eddie Vedder
item.description: "I've got my indignation but I'm pure in all my thoughts." -- Eddie Vedder
